body_html:
I built the pip package from source and installed it. Tensorboard can't render the events if I run:

tensorboard --logdir=/tmp/logs

but it works when I build tensorboard and run:

./bazel-bin/tensorflow/tensorboard/tensorboard --logdir=/tmp/logs

The only difference here seems to be the pip packaging.
body_text:
I built the pip package from source and installed it. Tensorboard can't render the events if I run:

The only difference here seems to be the pip packaging.
body:
I built the pip package from source and installed it. Tensorboard can't render the events if I run:

```
tensorboard --logdir=/tmp/logs
```

but it works when I build tensorboard and run:

```
./bazel-bin/tensorflow/tensorboard/tensorboard --logdir=/tmp/logs
```

The only difference here seems to be the pip packaging.
